title: The General’s Manor Young Concubine Survival Report - Novel Updates
tags: Ancient China   Beautiful Female Lead   Cold Love Interests   Cute Protagonist   Doting Love Interests   Doting Older Siblings   Doting Parents   Generals   Heartwarming   Honest Protagonist   Lack of Common Sense   Military   Misunderstandings   Naive Protagonist   Politics   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Shameless Protagonist   Short Story   Strong Love Interests   Transmigration   Villainess Noble Girls
author: Feng De Lingdang   Wind's Little Bell   风的铃铛
description:
I thought I was the heroine. As long as I could capture the heart of my life-long meal ticket in the end, I could become his true love, get married, have kids afterwards. In the end, giving birth to a boy could be considered as the story’s ending, and it’s all happily ever after.

Anyways, aren’t all the old stories written like this!?
But, I never would’ve thought that I would be stuck at the first step.
Because, my meal ticket is……
——G-general, ah!!! _(:з」∠)_

This work has another name, “Goose Goose Goose.” (Not)
(T/N: in reference to the classic Tang poem, “Song for the Goose.”)>
